recipe.title: Thai Green Curry
recipe.description: Aromatic coconut curry with vegetables and fragrant Thai basil

steps.descr: Heat oil in a wok, fry curry paste for 1 minute until fragrant
steps.instructions: Heat oil in a wok, fry curry paste for 1 minute until fragrant

on_enter.say: Right, let's get started by heating some oil in a wok. Add the curry paste and fry it for about one minute until it's beautifully fragrant. You'll know it's ready when the aroma fills the kitchen!

steps.descr: Add chicken and cook until sealed
steps.instructions: Add chicken and cook until sealed

on_enter.say: Now, let's add the sliced chicken. Cook it until it's sealed and has that lovely white colour on the outside.

steps.descr: Pour in coconut milk and bring to simmer
steps.instructions: Pour in coconut milk and bring to simmer

on_enter.say: Let's pour in the coconut milk and bring it to a gentle simmer. You'll see little bubbles forming on the surface.

steps.descr: Add vegetables and cook for 8-10 minutes
steps.instructions: Add vegetables and cook for 8-10 minutes

on_enter.say: Now, let's add the sliced bell pepper and green beans. Cook them for eight to ten minutes until they're tender but still have a bit of crunch.

steps.descr: Stir in fish sauce and palm sugar
steps.instructions: Stir in fish sauce and palm sugar

on_enter.say: Let's stir in the fish sauce and palm sugar. This will add a lovely balance of salty and sweet to our curry.

steps.descr: Add Thai basil just before serving
steps.instructions: Add Thai basil just before serving

on_enter.say: Now, just before serving, let's add those fresh Thai basil leaves. They'll add a wonderful fragrance and freshness to the dish.
Time to serve our delicious Thai green curry over some fluffy jasmine rice. Enjoy every bite!

notes.text:
Frying the curry paste releases its aromatics
Add bamboo shoots for authentic texture
Adjust sweetness and saltiness to taste
